title: Diamond Floral Adornment - Bridal Vaddanam/Necklace Pendant
materials: Brilliant Cut). Hyderabadi Polish applied for a lasting shine.
features: A delicate floral design inspired by traditional South Indian motifs, crafted with intricate filigree work. The piece features pave-set diamonds meticulously arranged to create a dazzling effect. The pendant's curvature is designed for comfortable wear as a vaddanam centerpiece or necklace pendant. A delicate teardrop shaped diamond pendant dangles from the center.
colors: Rose gold and sparkling white diamonds create a warm
occasions: and can be styled for contemporary evening wear. Suitable for brides looking for a modern twist on traditional jewelry.
description: This versatile piece can be worn as a Vaddanam (waist belt) centerpiece or as a statement necklace pendant. The exquisite diamond setting and Hyderabadi polish enhance its brilliance and durability. A timeless design blending traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern elegance.
